title: Secret Onsen: Mixed Bath Ryokan
description:
Shota has had a crush on Mai, his childhood friend, for a long time. He starts working part-time at a ryokan (Japanese inn) with her. While bathing, the young and beautiful female manager, Akari, suddenly jumps him and offers him "sex lessons" so he can become a proper "man". 
"Alright, it's time for the special service now."
author: Kirishima Yozakura
